thread.title: Amtek Auto shares nosedived over 30% on NSE
thread.title_full: Amtek Auto shares nosedived over 30% on NSE | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Amtek Auto shares nosedived over 30% on NSE
text:
Other Articles Financial Technologies renames itself as 63 Moons Technologies MF exposure to software stocks hits all-time high in July Majesco shares locked at upper circuit on debut Amtek Auto shares nosedived over 30 per cent on the National Stock Exchange after the exchange on August 18 announced that it has decided to exclude the stock from its equity derivatives segment.
The share price of the company plunged 30.77 per cent to Rs 89 on BSE and 36.36 per cent at Rs 81.75 on NSE.
The BSE Sensex jumped 100 points at 27931.64 on Wednesday.
The share price of the company tanked 71 per cent in the past month on NSE. It was at Rs 280.70 on July 20.
